name: Brick Game Bassic
description:
Brick Game Bassic is the classical and legendary game. I'm sure with you that you had played at least one time when you were child.
Feature:
- Especially, HOLD button, you can change the brick during playing.
- Drop brick's shadow for playing easier (Can turn on/off).
- Classic coffee cup in game with lots of fun.
- Pretty graphics and sound.
- Auto save game.
